QuestData.Title: Mograine's Reunion
QuestData.CompletionText: What is that you hold, $c?$B$BIt calls out to me, stirring feelings I thought to be long dead.
QuestData.RewardText: Impossible...$B$BFather, is it you?!$B$BYou have done me a great service, hero. I offer you the reins of my faithful steed. Do with it as you please, but do not forget those that assisted you in this monumental feat.
